# File lib/bundler/vendor/thor/util.rb, line 165
    def self.user_home
      @@user_home ||= if ENV["HOME"]
        ENV["HOME"]
      elsif ENV["USERPROFILE"]
        ENV["USERPROFILE"]
      elsif ENV["HOMEDRIVE"] && ENV["HOMEPATH"]
        File.join(ENV["HOMEDRIVE"], ENV["HOMEPATH"])
      elsif ENV["APPDATA"]
        ENV["APPDATA"]
      else
        begin
          File.expand_path("~")
        rescue
          if File::ALT_SEPARATOR
            "C:/"
          else
            "/"
          end
        end
      end
    end
